title: SyntaxError: unlabeled break must be inside loop or switch
summary: The JavaScript exception "unlabeled break must be inside loop or switch" occurs when a break statement is not inside a loop or a switch statement.
short_title: SyntaxError: unlabeled break must be inside loop or switch
